changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Fix stock_transactions.user_id to reference user_profiles instead of auth.users
changeSet.sql:
-- Drop existing foreign key constraint ALTER TABLE stock_transactions DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS fk_stock_transactions_users;
-- Add new foreign key constraint to user_profiles ALTER TABLE stock_transactions ADD CONSTRAINT fk_stock_transactions_user_profiles FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE;
